message.body: I told her. Still didn't say u had it for 2 months. She isn't itching and just had her hair colored. She's not worried. Its been 2 wks. If u think she shd do nix u cd tell her. She said she might

Very angry at Sarah Very upset that I took her to California, drove her all around Brooklyn. We took her to this beautiful place and spent all this time (and money) on her. Also Azeem believes he is a tikkun loam
￼In our bedroom. U get the other one.
